alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 16 at 1:32AM MDT until October 16 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 55 mph near Logan Canyon, Box Elder Canyon, and eastern portions of Weber and Davis County from South Ogden to Bountiful including Kaysville, Farmington and Centerville. East winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 45 mph elsewhere. * WHERE...Eastern Box Elder County, Northern Wasatch Front and Cache Valley/Utah Portion. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Strong crosswinds will be possible on I-15, US-89 and the Legacy Parkway in Weber and Davis Counties.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front
